languages.text: "Все зависит от электромонахов, что пережили нападение. На их счастье культисты не успели серьезно осквернить святыни — в том числе и благодаря усилиям братства. Тем не менее, не удивлюсь, если местный Эксплораторский флот, узнав о событиях, захочет нанести визит с целью ревизии и очищения пострадавших корпусов".

traits.locale_text: "Все зависит от электромонахов, что пережили нападение. На их счастье культисты не успели серьезно осквернить святыни — в том числе и благодаря усилиями братства. Тем не менее, не удивлюсь, если местный эксплораторский флот, узнав о событиях, захочет нанести визит с целью ревизии и очищения пострадавших корпусов".

languages.text: "It all depends on the Electro-Priests who survived the attack. Fortunately for them, the cultists did not manage to seriously corrupt the holy site, partly thanks to the priesthood's efforts. Nevertheless, I would not be surprised if the local Explorator Fleet decides to audit and purge the damaged units once it hears about what has happened."
languages.original_text: "Все зависит от электромонахов, что пережили нападение. На их счастье культисты не успели серьезно осквернить святыни — в том числе и благодаря усилиям братства. Тем не менее, не удивлюсь, если местный Эксплораторский флот, узнав о событиях, захочет нанести визит с целью ревизии и очищения пострадавших корпусов".

traits.locale_text: "It all depends on the electro-monks who survived the attack. Fortunately for them, the cultists did not manage to seriously corrupt the holy site, partly thanks to the brotherhood's efforts. Nevertheless, I would not be surprised if the local Explorator Fleet decides to audit and purge the damaged units once it hears about what has happened."

"It all depends on the electro-monks who survived the attack. Fortunately for them, the cultists did not manage to seriously corrupt the holy site, partly thanks to the brotherhood's efforts. Nevertheless, I would not be surprised if the local Explorator Fleet decides to audit and purge the damaged units once it hears about what has happened."

"It all depends on the electro-monks who survived the attack. Fortunately for them, the cultists did not manage to seriously corrupt the holy site, partly thanks to the brotherhood's efforts. Nevertheless, I would not be surprised if the local Explorator Fleet decides to audit and purge the damaged units once it hears about what has happened."

"It all depends on the Electro-Priests who survived the attack. Fortunately for them, the cultists did not manage to seriously corrupt the holy site, partly thanks to the priesthood's efforts. Nevertheless, I would not be surprised if the local Explorator Fleet decides to audit and purge the damaged units once it hears about what has happened."

languages.text: “这一切都得取决于那些在袭击中幸存下来的电僧。好消息是，那群邪教徒并没有对圣地造成严重的破坏，在某种程度上要归功于那群电僧的奋力反击。不过，如果开拓者舰队听说了那边发生的事情，决定对受损的单位进行审查与净化，我也并不会感到惊讶。”
languages.original_text: "It all depends on the Electro-Priests who survived the attack. Fortunately for them, the cultists did not manage to seriously corrupt the holy site, partly thanks to the priesthood's efforts. Nevertheless, I would not be surprised if the local Explorator Fleet decides to audit and purge the damaged units once it hears about what has happened."

traits.locale_text: “这一切都得取决于那些在袭击中幸存下来的驭电祭司。好消息是，那群邪教徒并没有对圣地造成严重的破坏，在某种程度上要归功于那群祭司的奋力反击。不过，如果开拓者舰队听说了那边发生的事情，决定对受损的单位进行审查与净化，我也并不会感到惊讶。”

languages.text: «Todo depende de los electromonjes que sobrevivieron al ataque. Por suerte para ellos, los sectarios no lograron corromper demasiado el lugar sagrado, en parte gracias a las acciones del clero. Sin embargo, no me sorprendería que la flota exploradora local realice una auditoría y purgue las unidades dañadas una vez descubra lo sucedido».
languages.original_text: "It all depends on the Electro-Priests who survived the attack. Fortunately for them, the cultists did not manage to seriously corrupt the holy site, partly thanks to the priesthood's efforts. Nevertheless, I would not be surprised if the local Explorator Fleet decides to audit and purge the damaged units once it hears about what has happened."

traits.locale_text: «Todo depende de los electromonjes que sobrevivieron al ataque. Por suerte para ellos, los sectarios no lograron corromper demasiado el lugar sagrado, en parte gracias a las acciones de la hermandad. Sin embargo, no me sorprendería que la flota exploradora local realice una auditoría y purgue las unidades dañadas una vez descubra lo sucedido».

languages.text: 「生き残ったエレクトロ・プリーストたち次第だ。彼らにとっては幸いなことに、盟約の努力のおかげもあって、教団は聖地を腐敗させきることはできなかった。とはいえ、現地の探索艦隊が、何が起こったかを耳にしたら、損害を受けた部隊を監査し、粛清することを決定することはあり得るだろう」
languages.original_text: "It all depends on the Electro-Priests who survived the attack. Fortunately for them, the cultists did not manage to seriously corrupt the holy site, partly thanks to the priesthood's efforts. Nevertheless, I would not be surprised if the local Explorator Fleet decides to audit and purge the damaged units once it hears about what has happened."

traits.locale_text: 「生き残ったエレクトロ・プリーストたち次第だ。彼らにとっては幸いなことに、盟約の努力のおかげもあって、教団は聖地を腐敗させきることはできなかった。とはいえ、現地の探索艦隊が、何が起こったかを耳にしたら、損害を受けた部隊を監査し、粛清することを決定することはあり得るだろう」

languages.text: « Tout dépend des électro-prêtres qui ont survécu à l'attaque. Heureusement pour eux, les cultistes ne sont pas parvenus à totalement corrompre le site sacré, notamment grâce à l'intervention du clergé. Néanmoins, il ne serait pas surprenant que la Flotte des Explorators locale décide de contrôler et de purger les unités endommagées une fois qu'elle aura appris ce qui s'est passé. »
languages.original_text: "It all depends on the Electro-Priests who survived the attack. Fortunately for them, the cultists did not manage to seriously corrupt the holy site, partly thanks to the priesthood's efforts. Nevertheless, I would not be surprised if the local Explorator Fleet decides to audit and purge the damaged units once it hears about what has happened."

traits.locale_text: « Tout dépend des électromoines qui ont survécu à l'attaque. Heureusement pour eux, les cultistes ne sont pas parvenus à totalement corrompre le site sacré, notamment grâce à l'intervention de la confrérie. Néanmoins, il ne serait pas surprenant que la Flotte Explorator locale décide de contrôler et de purger les unités endommagées une fois qu'elle aura appris ce qu'il s'est passé. »

languages.text: "Das hängt ganz von den Elektropriestern ab, die den Angriff überlebt haben. Sie hatten Glück, denn die Kultisten schafften es nicht, die heilige Stätte ernsthaft zu verderben, auch dank der Anstrengungen der Priesterschaft. Mich würde es trotzdem nicht überraschen, wenn die lokale Exploratorflotte beschließt, die beschädigten Einheiten zu überprüfen und zu entfernen, sobald sie von dem Vorfall erfährt."
languages.original_text: "It all depends on the Electro-Priests who survived the attack. Fortunately for them, the cultists did not manage to seriously corrupt the holy site, partly thanks to the priesthood's efforts. Nevertheless, I would not be surprised if the local Explorator Fleet decides to audit and purge the damaged units once it hears about what has happened."

traits.locale_text: "Das hängt ganz von den Elektromönchen ab, die den Angriff überlebt haben. Sie hatten Glück, denn die Kultisten schafften es nicht, die heilige Stätte ernsthaft zu verderben, auch dank der Anstrengungen der Bruderschaft. Mich würde es trotzdem nicht überraschen, wenn die lokale Exploratorflotte beschließt, die beschädigten Einheiten zu überprüfen und zu entfernen, sobald sie von dem Vorfall erfährt."

languages.original_text: "It all depends on the electro-monks who survived the attack. Fortunately for them, the cultists did not manage to seriously corrupt the holy site, partly thanks to the brotherhood's efforts. Nevertheless, I would not be surprised if the local Explorator Fleet decides to audit and purge the damaged units once it hears about what has happened."

languages.text: "Bu, tamamen saldırıdan sağ kurtulan Elektro Rahiplere bağlı. Neyse ki tarikatçılar, kısmen rahipliğin de çabaları sayesinde kutsal alanda ciddi bir yozlaşmaya sebebiyet vermeyi başaramadılar. Her hâlükârda yerli Keşiftör Filosu'nun olanları öğrendiği gibi hasarlı birimleri denetleyerek ortadan kaldırmaya karar vermesi, beni şaşırtmaz."
languages.original_text: "It all depends on the Electro-Priests who survived the attack. Fortunately for them, the cultists did not manage to seriously corrupt the holy site, partly thanks to the priesthood's efforts. Nevertheless, I would not be surprised if the local Explorator Fleet decides to audit and purge the damaged units once it hears about what has happened."
